comment: Does what it have to do

reply.author: Designer Calculators
reply.content: Hello! Thank you for reporting the issue with bitcoin rate. The problem should be fixed in the latest version (4.1) of our app. Thanks much for your patience.

comment: Very helpful for adding multiple currencies TOGETHER.  Feedback:. The calculator keypad is not standard....Please make standard layout or have option to change layout.  2nd. Bug in calculator that after clicking plus, then the first time I press decimal it doesn't register.  I have to always press decimal twice.  I have Google Pixel with all updates.  Update June 1 2017.  Terrible bug in calculator function that resets the number when typing a decimal.  No joke.  If you type 420.64 in the calculator, you'll end up with .64.  frustrating.

reply.author: Designer Calculators
reply.content: Hello! Thank you for reporting us about this issue with built-in calculator, and we're sorry for inconvenience. Our developers are working on fix, and will release it soon. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

author: JOHN LAWRENCE
comment: Love this App. It's fast and quick, instant results. Great when travelling to see how much things cost and what your spending. You can just have a few currencies on screen or lots, it's up to you. Well worth the small fee I paid. Actually checked yesterday in town against several exchange rates and could see how much you get ripped off my buying other currencies. I wouldn't be without this App, espeacially as I  live in Thailand part of the year. Only thing I would love is a Text Alert. Great. Update on my review. Been using this app a while now. Excellent app. Would not be without it. Accurate when I was exchanging money in Thailand. Great app and worth every penny. 5 Star.

author: Aslam Khudabux
comment: App gives me an impression of the value of the £ against € and vv. It dos not tell me what I should expect the exchange rate to be in a foreign exchange shop eg Western Union in say UK OR Europe. If it did, it would create more competition. And less victims of sharp practice.

author: Tony Soric
comment: Used 'Easy Currency Converter' for a long time but this one is superior due to being able to type into any currency without having to choose and swap what you want to work with.
title: Very good

author: Olav Norrud
comment: No shortlist "what do I pay for one unit of other currencies using mine". Little trust as there's no view of rate date and update date. Looks ok otherwise.
title: Not helping with my basic needs

comment: Useless application. XE Pro is far better then this crap

reply.author: Designer Calculators
reply.content: Hello! Thank you for the feedback. Please share your ideas how we can make the app better at converterfeedback@gmail.com. Thank you.

author: Albert Ecker
comment: It does what it should.  Painfree interface but you need to get the paid version to get rid of the ads and prevent battery drain.
title: Ok

author: Isaac Kamugo
comment: This is the best converter I have ever used. Hassle free. I like the interface and how the different currencies are displayed. It's never crashed and always updated rates. Highly recommended.
title: Best currency converter

author: Ilan Goldenberg
comment: When I comment something I like to talk about my own experience this app is the best conversion app I've ever used and I used three or four.
title: The best conversion app I've ever encountered

author: Sokre Haus
comment: With new update i no longer have wear support? SW3 Please fix!!
title: Verry good

author: Johnny Nasello
comment: This is a great currency converter app. It's easy to compare currencies of several countries at a time, and the built in calculator is convenient. I live overseas and use it all the time.

author: bel bel
comment: I have used the free version for a long time, it was time to go for this version. :)

author: Jim B
comment: This app is clean and simple, easy to use without extra fluff.  The paid version is well worth the small price.  Highly recommended.
title: Well designed

author: Joe Suever
comment: Simple to use, easily configured to show only the currencies that you are interested in.   A must for our Northern European cruise where many different currencies are used.

author: dona maxcy
comment: This is the second curr converter app i used when visiting my daughter in Aus. The first one sucked with so many ads. This one is magic!

author: James Macleod
comment: Great looking and easy to use UI. Also very easy to organise you most viewed currencies.
title: Best currency conversion app I've used.

author: Jonnie Bangkok
comment: Great currency conversion tool for travelers and expats...easy to use and unobtrusive ads. Nice suite of related financial tools and calculators included.

author: Sarah Akers
comment: Can't fault this app, all round it's an excellent straight forward product
title: Top notch

author: A Google User
comment: A must have app! Simple, easy to use. Finally with calculator.
title: Great

author: OLAJIDE EGBONWON
comment: I luv this app. It's very good nd educating nd guick instant results,great caculator nd so good for traveling with.
title: I luv it

author: Trudy Wilson
comment: Great for keeping upto date with the exchange rates, however I no longer have graphs which is slightly annoying.

reply.author: Designer Calculators
reply.content: Hello Trudy! Thank you for reporting us  about this issue with graphics, and we're sorry for inconvenience it caused. Our developers are alerted about it, and will fix the problem as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience and understanding. With additional comments please contact us at converterfeedback@gmail.com. Thank you.

author: Les Lampman
comment: It's simple, it's good looking, and it's quick. It works exactly like I hoped it would.  I couldn't ask for more really.

author: Herwig Syen
comment: It's a great app, lets me customise what I need, looks good too
title: Easy to use love it

author: Fernando Sanchez
comment: Practical interface, readily available and you can update it through home screen.
title: Handy and easy to use

author: Olivier-Pierre De Belmont
comment: takes me a little time(3minutes)to appreciate all features.amazing and so clear..thank to the designer.

author: Thaki Christophides
comment: To be able to see 3,4 or 5 currencies at the same time is a winner for me.
title: Best currency app

author: Gerhart Steiner
comment: Once this was a great app but i think they removed the Wear Extension which is a real good exercise for a Wearable

author: sudin mamat
comment: Converting from one currency to other currencies is a breeze & the exchange rate is up-to-date.
title: Nice interface.

author: John Fuller
comment: Great for keeping track of rates when on holiday. The calculator also comes in handy. Highly recommended.
title: Great app

author: Darko Martić
comment: I'd like to see a more modern UI, and calculator to have history log.

reply.author: Designer Calculators
reply.content: Hello Darko! Thank you for the feedback. We'll consider your suggestion to update UI and add a history log for calculator for future updates, thank you for sharing. With additional comments please contact us at converterfeedback@gmail.com. Thank you.

author: Shaban IddrisuTM
comment: Comes in handy. It's been awesome using this app. Fresh and always up to date.
title: Great

author: Garry McMahon
comment: Too soon to give accurate meaningful opinion. It's been ok up to now.

reply.author: Designer Calculators
reply.content: Hello Garry! Thank you for the feedback. Please feel free to contact us at converterfeedback@gmail.com with any questions or suggestions about the app. Thank you.

author: Alan Jalocha
comment: Best currency conversion app out
title: Great app

author: Jurgen Coucke
comment: Does exactly what it is supposed to do, reliable, I personally use it every day
title: Comprehensive

author: Sheila Skipper
comment: This app is easy to use and is helpful for quickly determining exchange rates.

author: Rudsyn
comment: Great reliable app it keeps me up to date with currency exchanges.

author: Tuong Thuy Tran
comment: Cool app! Serve my needs! 5 star if there is widget for it!

author: Abdur-Razzaq Beckford
comment: It's a good app, which let's me know how the pound is doing 😆
Reliable and accurate. Simple UI. It does everything I need it to do.
